mapper.insert: insert into meeting_participants(user_id, meeting_id, authority) values (#{userId}, #{meetingId}, #{authority});
mapper.select: select count(*) from meeting_participants where user_id=#{userId} and meeting_id =#{meetingId}
select authority from meeting_participants where user_id=#{userId} and meeting_id =#{meetingId}
select m.* from meeting_participants p join meeting m where p.meeting_id = m.meeting_id and p.user_id= #{userId};
mapper.delete: delete from meeting_participants where user_id=#{userId} and meeting_id=#{meetingId}
